description: Get dinner on the table in 20 minutes with this easy fried rice recipe. What's even better is that this meal comes in at less than $2.50 per serve.
keywords: Fried rice,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Video,Low sugar,Sesame free,Budget,Fakeaway,High protein,High fibre,Rice,Quick & easy lunch,Dairy free
name: Fried Rice With Egg Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch spring onion, white and green parts separated, thinly sliced
500g Prep Set Go stir fry mixed vegetables

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add garlic and white part of onion. Cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until starting to brown.

Add rice and cook, stirring and breaking up rice with a wooden spoon, for 3 minutes or until heated through. Add soy and half of the kecap manis. Cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until rice is evenly coated. Add vegetables and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until vegetables are heated through.
Meanwhile, add remaining oil to a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Crack eggs into pa, then cook for 2 minutes or until cooked to your liking.
Divide rice among bowls and top with egg. Drizzle with remaining kecap manis and sprinkle with green part of onion
